item.title: Massive gold & lithium deposits found in Karnataka’s reserved forest zones
item.description:
<![CDATA[New geological surveys trace high-grade gold and key lithium reserves in Raichur and Koppal, but mining faces hurdles due to protected forest status.
Karnataka, often called the land of gold and sandalwood, has once again proven its rich natural heritage. A recent geological survey by the state’s Department of Mines and Geology has revealed large deposits of gold and lithium across Raichur and Koppal districts.
